title: Where do i buy more rune pages
body: i cant find where to get more rune pages for the life of my in the new store can anyone help me out?

replies.body: In either the alpha client or live, you'll find runes under the Gameplay section.  There is a button on the left side to select Runes.  Hope that helps!
thanks i finnally found it you have to select  tier: select all, if you have tier 3 runes showing it wont show the rune pages
